attributes.action: Keep driving tests going and extend theory dates
attributes.background: A whole year has been wasted. It is not fair on people who have been working hard for theory tests and driving tests. We should have an extension on the theory and driving test should carry on with the correct ppe.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462

Extend driving theory test certificates expiring in 2020/21 by 12 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558160

Publish a plan for dealing with the driving test backlog: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558971
